column1: Rule 1: Modifiers containing an amino acid structure with a short, unbranched side chain (2-5 carbons) and a terminal carboxylic acid group
column2: Rule 2: Modifiers with a phenyl group directly attached to a carboxylic acid group and an electron-withdrawing substituent in the para position
column3: Rule 3: Modifiers with a sulfanyl group in a simple aliphatic chain
column4: Rule 4: Modifiers with multiple hydroxyl groups in a linear arrangement
column5: Rule 5: Modifiers with a trifluoroacetyl group
column6: Rule 6: Modifiers with a methoxy group on an aromatic ring
column7: Rule 7: Modifiers with a long aliphatic chain that lack solubility-enhancing groups
column8: Rule 8: Modifiers containing an indole group
column9: Rule 9: Modifiers with a formyl group on an aromatic ring
column10: Rule 10: Modifiers with a pyridine ring and electron-withdrawing groups
column11: Rule 11: Modifiers with a benzofuran structure
column12: Rule 12: Modifiers with a hydroxyl group on a phenyl ring
column13: Rule 13: Modifiers with a sulfanyl group on an aromatic ring
column14: Rule 14: Modifiers with a pyridine ring without electron-withdrawing groups
column15: Rule 15: Modifiers with a carboxylic acid group and a secondary amine in a cyclic structure
